mapper.insert: insert into mymember (mem_id, mem_pass, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_addr, mem_photo) values(#{memId}, #{memPass}, #{memName}, #{memTel}, #{memAddr}, #{memPhoto} )
mapper.update: update mymember set mem_pass = #{memPass}, mem_tel = #{memTel}, mem_name = #{memName}, mem_addr = #{memAddr}, mem_photo = #{memPhoto} where mem_id = #{memId}
mapper.select: select mem_id as memId , mem_pass as memPass , mem_name as memName , mem_tel as memTel , mem_addr as memAddr , mem_photo as memPhoto from mymember where mem_id = #{memId}
select mem_id as memId , mem_pass as memPass , mem_name as memName , mem_tel as memTel , mem_addr as memAddr from mymember order by mem_id asc
